CentOS 7 装机

Created: 05 Jun 2016

Author:  Chen Xie

Setup

For centos 7

Compatible with windows

Install ntfs-3g

# or yum search epel
wget https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/7/x86_64/e/epel-release-7-5.noarch.rpm
rpm -ivUh epel-release-7-5.noarch.rpm

yum install ntfs-3g

system bootup recovery

grub2-mkconfig -o /boot/grub2/grub.cfg

Feature

  • package: yum and rpm
